samples.text: FFS make sure it's not rice from California! They reuse waste water from oil drilling for irrigation. The truly stupid part is they've created a regulation that doesn't allow fracking water to be used. Both carry almost the exact same toxins.

Quick Background Info Last October, Clean Air Council and Environmental Integrity Project submitted a rulemaking petition to the EQB in support of increasing setback distances between new fracking wells and homes, schools, hospitals, and drinking water wells to protect public health.
